DFIFF.summary: Diamond Fields Resources Inc. explores for and evaluates mineral properties worldwide. The company explores for diamonds, zinc, copper, silver, gold, lead, zircon, and other metals. The company holds a 100% interest in the Namibian Diamond project; Madagascar Zircon project; and Atlantis II Red Sea project. The company was formerly known as Diamond Fields International Ltd. and changed its name to Diamond Fields Resources Inc. in December 2017. Diamond Fields Resources Inc. incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Beau Vallon, Mauritius. Diamond Fields Resources Inc. is a subsidiary of Spirit Resources SARL.
